text: Va ʙa suji [qavmi] Samud ʙarodarason Solehro [firistodem]. U guft: «Ej qavmi man Allohro ʙiparasted, ki cuz U ma'ʙude [ʙar haq] nadored. U sumoro az zamin padid ovard va oʙodonii onro ʙa sumo voguzost, pas, az U omurzis ʙitalaʙed, sipas ʙa sujas ʙozgarded [va tavʙa kuned]. Be tardid, Parvardigoram nazdik [va] icoʙatgar ast»
